RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 26000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR FOUR YEAR OLDS. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALIBU S S stalked two wide, bid entering the lane, and drove clear approaching midstretch. GORMLEYS GOT GAME stalked along the inside, tipped three wide and outside of the new leader in upper stretch, and ran on to prove second best. TEE BURNS set the pace along the inside, but was headed by the eventual winner at the qaurter pole, and gave way. MILLARD'S SMILE lagged behind, and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Gormleys Got Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, 3wd upper, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Millard's Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged behind, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu S S
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2wd, bid 1/4, cleared upper

ENTRY.NAME: Tee Burns
ENTRY.OWNER: Pohl Dennis Throm Keith H and Gavilsky II Lawrence
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins, headed 1/4, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OVER A MILE SINCE JULY 26, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Ent ered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERMONONTHEMOUNT vied along the inside around the first turn, got rated back under firm restraint entering the backstretch, rebid outside of the leader as outer foes inched closer as well leaving the nine sixteenths pole, vied nearing the far turn, led at the three furlong pole, drew off turning for home, and was driven home to seal the deal. COLOR FAST leaned outwardly and was taken in hand to avoid contact at the start, trailed and became detached around the first turn, gut the gap two wide around the far turn, fanned five wide entering the lane, rallied outside of foes on his left lead, and gained place while changing over at the sixteenth pole. MISHKO tracked along the inside, moved forward outside of an inner bidding foe to press leaving the nine sixteenths pole, but failed to keep pace with that rival into the far turn, chased around that bend, bid for place entering the lane, gained that position in upper stretch, but was outkicked by an outer rival in the final furlong. MUSCADINE laid off of the pace along the inside, tracked entering the far turn, progressed to bid for place two wide and between horses entering the lane, but tired. EAST LEX tracked three wide, got floated four wide down the backstretch, and faded around the far turn. THE GRAY BLUR was lightly brushed by rivals on either side at the start, lacked speed in the four to three paths around the first turn, and was done early. CAP ROCK MINER set the pace two wide before clearing an inner rival entering the backstretch, but was headed by that foe's outer re-bid at the three furlong pole, weakened entering the lane, was eased up in the final furlong, and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Muscadine
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, tracked 2nd, place bid 2wd btw 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sermononthemount
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied ins, rated back3/4, rebid 2w9/16, led 3/8, drew off, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Mishko
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins,pressd 3w9/16,chased 2nd,place bid 3w1/4,outkckd late

ENTRY.NAME: Color Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: leand out st,lag behind,gain 2w2nd,5w1/4,rally,left ld,up plc1/16

ENTRY.NAME: East Lex
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3wd, 4wd 9/16, faded 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: The Gray Blur
ENTRY.COMMENT: light brush btwn start, off pace 4-3p1st, done early

ENTRY.NAME: Cap Rock Miner
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2w,clear 3/4,ins foe1/2,headed 3/8,wknd,eased late,walk off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Their Last 3 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIL WOADIE vied for the lead two wide and between horses, wrestled an advantage while dueling entering the lane, and drove clear entering the final sixteenth. HEZA SEXY ZONG set the pace inside of a pair of pressers, dueled turning for home, got headed at the quarter pole, fought on through midstretch, but succumbed at the sixteenth pole. TRADER PRICE was herded outwardly by an inner foe at the start, tucked while off of the pace entering the turn, swung out to the seven path in upper stretch, and moved up in the final furlong. CHECK ME OUT broke a bit outwardly, laid close up along the inside, but was put to firm restraint while failing to secure position inside of the leader at the five furlong pole, wrangled back and shifted out to settle leaving the nine sixteenths marker, then stalked the leaders from the three to two paths around the bend, then chased through the lane before being outfinished for show. SILVER CHALICE broke a step slow at the start, rushed outside of rivals to press the top pair leaving the nine sixteenths pole, but yielded to those rivals entering the lane, and gave way. PARTY LITTLE BOY hopped before taking back from crowded quarters between horses at the start, trailed along the inside, fanned to the nine path in upper stretch, and was outrun while hanging on his left lead.

ENTRY.NAME: Check Me Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,close up inside,firm hold 5/8-9/16,stalked 3-2p,chased

ENTRY.NAME: Trader Price
ENTRY.COMMENT: herded out start, off pace, tucked 7/16, 7p upr, moved up late

ENTRY.NAME: Party Little Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped/crowded start, trailed ins, 9p upr, left lead

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Sexy Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed ins pair, dueled, headed 1/4, fought on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Chalice
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, rushed 4wd, pressed 3w9/16, yielded 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Woadie
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2wd btwn, led 1/4, dueled, drove clear 1/16

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 52000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: G'WILDCAT pressed two wide, bid turning for home, led at the quarter pole, and drew off under moderate urging. HOORAY AUSTIN laid off of the pace in the three path, then rallied between horses in midstretch to gain place. BINDING AGREEMENT stalked the top pair from the three path, but drifted to the four path entering the lane, and yielded. SCARLETTSBLACKJACK set the pace as an outer rival pressed around the turn, got headed entering the lane, and gave way. GOLDEN PALACE pursued from off of the pace in the four to five paths and outside of foes around the turn, then lacked a bid. WIN YA WIN failed to respond to urging to keep pace with the rest of the field early on, was distanced while eased around the turn, and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Hooray Austin
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins-3p, rallied btwn, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Win Ya Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: detached early, outrun eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlettsblackjack
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ins winner turn, headed 1/4, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Binding Agreement
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked ins, 3p turn, 4p1/4, yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4-5p turn, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: G'wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd, bid 5/16, led 1/4, drew off, ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 55000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $10,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 26, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $80,000. Weig ht, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Races Where Entered For $62,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARRANT stalked two wide, snagged the advantage from a wide rival at the three quarter pole, showed the way down the backstretch, clung to a margin from a trio of bidders turning for home, shook free in upper stretch, held sway through midstretch, flopped back to his left lead entering the final sixteenth, and kept an outer chaser at bay. MAILMAN MONEY tracked along the inside, checked slightly while rating back entering the backstretch, yet pulled forward to a stalking position a furlong later, shifted outside of the leader to bid for the lead two wide and among foes turning for home, but failed to keep pace with the pace setter in upper stretch, and chased that foe home willingly through the final furlong. CASH LOGISTICS tracked in the four path, floated to the seven path entering the backstretch, ranged up four wide around the far turn to bid turning for home, but yielded to an inner pair in upper stretch. RIGHTANDJUST pressed outside of the leader and from the four path, drifted to the seven path entering the backstretch, but required urging to sustain pressure from the three path around the far turn, got outmoved by bidders on either side turning for home, and weakened entering the lane. DUST EM set the pace in the three path, but was headed by rivals on either side at the three quarter pole, chased from between horses into the far turn, but faded while fanning five wide entering the lane. THE FINAL TIME WAS CORRECTED ELECTRONICALLY.

ENTRY.NAME: Mailman Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: trackd ins,light check3/4,pulld,stalkd,bid 2wd btw5/16,chasd well

ENTRY.NAME: Warrant
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2wd,ins bid3/4,led,ins trio 5/16,shook free upr,held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Logistics
ENTRY.OWNER: Hancock, James B. and Charlie A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4p,7p3/4,ranged up 4w2nd,bid 5/16,yielded upper

ENTRY.NAME: Dust Em
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 3p, headed btw3/4, chased btwn, 5w1/4, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Rightandjust
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 4p, drift 7p3/4, urged 3p2nd, wknd btwn 1/4

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 51000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $17,500. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since November 2 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $17,500 (Races Where Entered For $30,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MINNESOTA READY tracked two to three wide and between horses, ranged up outside of the top pair turning for home, spun into the lane in the four path, wrestled an advantage from an inner rival at the furlong grounds, and drove clear. ZIPPIN GIGI set the pace inside of a pressing rival, shook free from a group of chasers entering the lane, held sway through upper stretch, but was headed at the furlong grounds, and held place thereafter. TWIRLING ROSES pressed two wide, vied around the turn, but was outkicked by an outer bidder while chasing the leader in upper stretch, kept on to bid for place late, but was fended off. GREYS THE BOY stalked along the inside, then chased evenly while lacking the needed kick. BOYFRIEND MATERIAL never got involved. UNDERHILL'S TAB broke through the starting gate pre-race, but was quickly re-loaded without further incident, chased four wide under urging around the turn, then yielded in the five path entering the lane, and weakened on his left lead.

ENTRY.NAME: Greys the Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, chased evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Zippin Gigi
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ins foe turn, held sway upr, headed 1/8, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Minnesota Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2-3wd btwn, ranged up 5/16, 4p1/4, bid, led 1/8, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Underhill's Tab
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke through gate, tracked 4wd, urged turn, yielded 1/4, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Twirling Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd, vied turn, chased/outkicked upr, denied place

ENTRY.NAME: Boyfriend Material
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 73. Allowance Purse 51000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since December 26 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Their Last 3 Starts). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this ra ce over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 34 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COFFEE COUNTY bumped an outer rival soon after the start, stalked along the inside, pulled to press between the top pair at the nine sixteenths pole, relaxed behind them around the far turn, yet split them in upper stretch, gained an advantage from an outer rival coming to the furlong grounds, and drove clear leaving it. SCORING DRIVE tracked in the four to three paths and between horses around the turn, shifted out to the six path in upper stretch, stayed on between foes to claim place late, and held that position from an outer rival thereafter. ONEFORVIVI stuttered a step before being bumped by an inner rival at the start, trailed in the six path around the first turn, pursued from the five to six paths around the far turn, fanned to the eight path in upper stretch, stayed on to bid for place along with an inner foe late, but was fended off. SINGLE SHOT vied for the lead in the three path, led from an inner rival around the far turn, showed the way entering the lane, but was outkicked by an inner bidder nearing the furlong grounds, gave way, and lost place to a pair of outer rivals while faltering late. PERRINS tracked in the four path, pressed among rivals around the far turn, but chases inner foes in upper stretch, and was outkicked by outer rivals in the final furlong. MO CREDO lacked speed in the three to four paths, swung to the eleven path in upper stretch, and surpassed tiring rivals. NORTHERNREFLECTION leaned out at the start, laid off of the pace in the five path, inched closer to striking range nearing the far turn, but faded in the seven path and between horses in upper stretch. COURTMAN vied along the inside, failed to keep pace with outer rivals entering the lane before steadying in tight quarters at the three sixteenths pole, and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Perrins
ENTRY.OWNER: Dilschneider Adele B and Stall Nicole
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4p, pressed btw 2nd, chased upper, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Coffee County
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp st,stalk ins,pull btw9/16,pocket 2nd,split upr,bid,cleard 1/8

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Moon Lake Equine Center LLC & Ronald L.Worley

ENTRY.NAME: Oneforvivi
ENTRY.COMMENT: stuttered step/bumpd st,trail 6p,5-6p2nd,8p upr,stay,denied place

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Credo
ENTRY.OWNER: Thompson Racing LLC (Stephen Thompson) and OM Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p, trailed 4p2nd, 11p upr, passed tired

ENTRY.NAME: Courtman
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied ins, yielded 1/4, steadied 3/16, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Scoring Drive
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4p btwn,3p2nd,6p upr,stayed on btwn,up place late,held

ENTRY.NAME: Northernreflection
ENTRY.OWNER: Summerhill Farm and Scruggs Roger D
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned out start, off pace 5p, in range 2nd, faded 7p btw upr

ENTRY.NAME: Single Shot
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2w-3p, led 2nd, outkicked 1/8, lost place/faltered late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 53000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 26 Allowed 3 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE CHEESE settled off of the pace along the inside, was buried along the fence towards the rear with plenty of run in reserve turning for home, tipped to the four path entering the lane, remained blocked behind traffic leaving the quarter pole, yet smoothly split foes when a seam opened at the three sixteenths marker, surged to bid at the furlong grounds, and inched clear. DREWHUSTLE set the pace, gamely clung to a margin from outer rivals in upper stretch, but was headed at the furlong grounds, and tenaciously saved place. SMARTY ALEX took a bump from an inner rival soon after the start, raced at the rear two wide, attempted to gain four wide around the far turn before being fanned seven wide entering the lane, but was outkicked by an inner rival while launching a rally in upper stretch, and sustained a charge to miss reaching place. OAK HILL SOLUTION leaned out and bumped a rival at the start, pressed two wide, bid between horses in upper stretch, but was outkicked at the furlong grounds, and yielded. BIND FAITH stalked three wide, chased four wide leaving the quarter pole, drifted five wide at the three sixteenths marker, and yielded between horses in midstretch. PLAY MO tracked two wide, chased from between horses around the far turn, fanned five wide entering the lane, but lacked a bid. DRILLING REPORT steadied from tight rail quarters around the first turn, tracked from the inside thereafter, but encountered mild traffic leaving the quarter pole, and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Smarty Alex
ENTRY.OWNER: Alexis Claire Racing Services LLC and Pohl Dennis
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumpd start,at rear 2w,4w2nd,7w1/4,outkicked,rallied,missed place

ENTRY.NAME: Drilling Report
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied 1st, tracked ins, traffic 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Oak Hill Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned out/bump st, press 2w, bid btw upr, outkicked 1/8, yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Cheese
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins,buried 5/16,blockd 4p1/4,split 3/16,bid1/8,inchd clr

ENTRY.NAME: Drewhustle
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, game upper, headed 1/8, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Bind Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd, chased 4w1/4, yielded btwn 5w1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Play Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2wd, off pace btwn 2nd, 5w1/4, no bid
